title: New: Japandroids – The House That Heaven Built
body:
For a two piece, **Japandroids** make one hell of a racket, and I mean that in the most complimentary way possible.

With new single _The House That Heaven Built_, they’ve created one of the finest tracks of the year thus far; a rifftastic sludge-rock inspired number, gyrating wildly throughout it’s five minute length. As well as dropping this new track, the Canadian two piece have also announced details of a new record, entitled _**Celebration Rock**_, out 5 June. Check out _The House That Heaven Built_ below, and the track listing for the new record under that.

_The Nights of Wine and Roses_  
_Fire’s Highway_  
_Evil’s Sway_  
_For the Love of Ivy_  
_Adrenaline Nightshift_  
_Younger Us_  
_The House That Heaven Built_  
_Continuous Thunder_
